mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(l.id,'')id, IFNULL(l.`name`,'')`name`, IFNULL(l.hot,'')hot, IFNULL(l.creation_time,'')creation_time, IFNULL(l.state,'')state, IFNULL(o.id,'')oid FROM t_shared_office_label l LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM t_label_to_shared_office WHERE shared_office_id = #{id} ) o ON o.shared_office_id = l.id
